channel.title: Custom ID's?
channel.description:
How do I find custom item id's?
I want them for a server.
Can anyone help please.

item.title: Custom ID's?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Class8 is client-sided, but it would work, however there is a much easier solution.

Simply open up your item.cfg file in your server folder. Just search for the item which you want the ID for, and it will be right next to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom ID's?
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

[quote=“Mr…x…, post:3, topic:354975”]Lol…Just go to your client then class 8 scroll down till you see items and stuff…should like something like this…

if(i == xxxx) (id) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 7114; class8.anInt181 = 1740; class8.anInt190 = 444; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = -8; class8.anInt165 = 5024; class8.anInt200 = 5025; class8.anInt174 = 5026; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "xxxxxxx";(name of item) class8.aByteArray178 = "xxxxx".getBytes();(item info) [/quote]

This.

item.title: Custom ID's?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Lol…Just go to your client then class 8 scroll down till you see items and stuff…should like something like this…

        if(i == xxxx)  (id)
        {
            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
            class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
            class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
            class8.anIntArray160[0] = 926;
            class8.anIntArray156[1] = 912;
            class8.anIntArray160[1] = 7114;
            class8.anInt181 = 1740;
            class8.anInt190 = 444;
            class8.anInt198 = 0;
            class8.anInt204 = 0;
            class8.anInt169 = 0;
            class8.anInt194 = -8;
            class8.anInt165 = 5024;
            class8.anInt200 = 5025;
            class8.anInt174 = 5026;
            class8.anInt188 = -1;
            class8.anInt164 = -1;
            class8.anInt175 = -1;
            class8.anInt197 = -1;
            class8.aString170 = "xxxxxxx";(name of item)
            class8.aByteArray178 = "xxxxx".getBytes();(item info)

item.title: Custom ID's?
item.dc:creator: @brokensword brokensword
item.description:
@brokensword wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Don’t advertise.

Also, custom item IDs all depend on the source.

One server could have Dragon Claws: ID: 8002, another could have Bandos’ Kiteshield: ID: 8002.

You never know.[/quote]

How we suppose to find out ahha.

It custom items for “Project Insanity”

Read full topic
